lead_paragraph: Argentina, still reeling from the shock resignations of captain Lionel Messi and coach Gerardo Martino, have chosen Edgardo Bauza as their new coach, the Argentine FA said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Argentina Pick Twice Libertadores Winner Bauza as Coach
headline.main: Argentina Pick Twice Libertadores Winner Bauza as Coach

snippet: Argentina, still reeling from the shock resignations of captain Lionel Messi and coach Gerardo Martino, have chosen Edgardo Bauza as their new coach, the Argentine FA said on Monday....
